news.description: Essential investment in the UK's energy system is still being deterred by policy uncertainty, a survey suggests. Members of the Energy Institute say investing in nuclear and renewables is risky following unpredicted delays and changes in subsidies.
news.title: Investors deterred by energy policy uncertainty

news.description: Melting ice in Antarctica puts as many as 30 million people in Bangladesh at risk of losing their homes over the coming century, according to a new documentary focused on the human cost of climate change.
news.title: Film links melting glaciers, land loss in Bangladesh

news.description: Australian scientists are studying a heat–resistant strain of super–corals that could withstand the rising ocean temperatures causing devastating bleaching of the Great Barrier Reef.
news.title: Super–coral may take heat off Great Barrier Reef bleaching

news.description: ASEAN–China relations and the East Sea issue dominated a special meeting between foreign ministers from ASEAN and China in Kunming, in China’s Yunnan Province, sources from Vietnamnews said on June 14. Deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Minister Phạm Bình Minh led the Vietnamese delegation to the event, which was co–chaired by Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi and his Singaporean counterpart Vivian Balakrishnan.
news.title: East Sea dominates ASEAN–China talks

news.description: Jawa Timur akan mengalami fenomena Cuaca La Nina mulai Juli hingga September 2016. Fenomena ini ditandai dengan curah hujan tinggi. Fenomena baru terlihat lewat kekuatan angin saja.
news.title: Fenomena Cuaca La Lina Berlangsung di Malang dan Sejumlah Kota Jawa Timur, Ketahui Akibatnya

news.description: ASEAN–China relations and the East Sea issue dominated a special meeting of foreign ministers of ASEAN and China in Kunming, in the Chinese province of Yunnan on June 14. Deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Minister Pham Binh Minh led the Vietnamese delegation to the event which was co–chaired by Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi and his Singaporean counterpart Vivian Balakrishnan.
news.title: ASEAN–China relations, East Sea issue featured at special meeting

news.description: Operasi pemberantasan rumpon–rumpon di perairan Nusa Tenggara Timur masih menunggu perubahan kondisi cuaca di perairan membaik, kata Kepala Bidang Pengawasan Perikanan Tangkap Dinas Kelautan dan Perikanan Provinsi NTT Ganef Wurgiyanto.
news.title: Pemberantasan Rumpon Di NTT Terkendala Cuaca

news.description: Bagi teman–teman yang tinggal di daerah pesisir atau memiliki rencana mengunjungi pantai, diharapkan berhati–hati. BMKG telah mengumumkan bahwa dalam beberapa hari ke depan Indonesia masih akan mengalami gelombang tinggi di lautan.
news.title: Hati–Hati pada Gelombang Tinggi

news.description: The government is developing the National Water Balance Management System (Nawabs) to optimise water distribution during prolonged droughts in future.
news.title: Govt developing new water management system to optimise water distribution

news.description: Cuaca buruk yang terjadi wilayah Banyuwangi dan sekitarnya, membuat Unit Penyelenggara Pelabuhan (UPP) Ketapang Banyuwangi, memberlakukan sistem buka tutup pelayaran di pelabuhan penyeberangan Ketapang Banyuwangi Jawa Timur, – Gilimanuk, Jembrana Bali.
news.title: Cuaca Buruk, Pelabuhan Ketapang Terapkan Sistem Buka Tutup
